entry.title: RSS Feed Now Deprecated
entry.summary: The Gwern.net RSS is now permanently deprecated. Maintaining the Haskell library for it over the years has been a struggle and I never found a good way to use it which was not either uselessly detailed and wasteful, like per-revision RSS items, or didn't put an unacceptable burden on myself in addition to the newsletter ( https://www.gwern.net/tags/newsletter https://tinyletter.com/gwern ) and social media. If you wish to continue subscribing via RSS, please use the subreddit RSS feed: https://www.reddit.com/r/gwern/.rss or look into a email→RSS conversion of the monthly newsletter or a web→RSS version of https://www.gwern.net/Changelog .
